ProjectData.name: I-BASH: The Imaging of Brain Anomalies in Super Heroes study
ProjectData.description: The Imaging of Brain Anomalies in Super Heroes study (I-BASH) is a multicentre cohort of individuals with these powers as well as close family members or siblings without enhancement, who serve as a natural control group.
ProjectData.keywords: super-heroes t1 t2 diffusion fMRI spin-labelling
